Class SecurityConfig

java.lang.Object
scot.gov.scotaccountclient.SecurityConfig
@Configuration @EnableWebSecurity public class SecurityConfig extends Object
Security configuration for the ScotAccount client application. This class configures the OAuth2/OIDC client security settings and integrates with ScotAccount's authentication service. Key features:
  • OAuth2/OIDC client configuration with PKCE support
  • JWT-based client authentication using client assertions
  • Custom token response handling
  • Secure session management
  • Protected endpoint configuration
Security measures:
  • CSRF protection enabled with cookie-based tokens
  • Session fixation protection
  • Secure cookie configuration
  • PKCE for authorization code flow
  • JWT validation using JWKS
Protected endpoints:
  • Public: /, /login, /error, static resources
  • OAuth2: /oauth2/authorization/**, /login/oauth2/code/**
  • Protected: All other endpoints require authentication
